plays.text: Penalty to Mikko Eloranta 2 minutes for Slashing Eric Brewer
Penalty to Ryan Smyth 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Steve Heinze
Goal scored by Zigmund Palffy assisted by Adam Deadmarsh and Mathieu Schneider

Penalty to Andreas Lilja 2 minutes for Tripping Jason Smith
Goal scored by Ethan Moreau assisted by Mike Grier
Penalty to Janne Niinimaa 2 minutes for Holding the Stick(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Mattias Norstrom 2 minutes for Holding Georges Laraque
Penalty to Mikko Eloranta 2 minutes for Holding the Stick(opposing player not identified)
